en.value: What is the purpose of an anti-lock braking system (ABS)?
To prevent the wheels from locking up during braking
What is the function of a catalytic converter in a vehicle's exhaust system?
To reduce harmful emissions from the exhaust gases
What does the term 'horsepower' measure in a vehicle's engine?
The power or work output of the engine
What is the purpose of a differential in a vehicle's drivetrain?
To allow the wheels to rotate at different speeds while turning
What is the function of a radiator in a vehicle's cooling system?
To dissipate heat from the engine coolant
What is the purpose of a clutch in a manual transmission vehicle?
To engage or disengage the engine from the transmission
What is the function of a power steering system in a vehicle?
To assist the driver in turning the steering wheel
What is the purpose of a timing belt in a vehicle's engine?
To synchronize the opening and closing of the engine's valves
What is the function of an airbag in a vehicle's safety system?
To provide cushioning and protection to the occupants in the event of a collision
What is the purpose of a fuel pump in a vehicle's fuel system?
To pump fuel from the tank to the engine
